name: Win-Winhalla
description:
In Win-Winhalla you have to work together with other players to defend Valhalla in the center of the map from other tribes.

You earn Population and Mead by defeating approaching Vikings.

Spend Population to build towers or send them to attack other players lanes, giving them more Population, Mead and earning you Glory.

You can choose between the cheap, short range Axe Tower, the medium Archer Tower and the long range, heavy hitting but slow Catapult.

But watch out, your population will keep consuming Mead and if they outgrow your Mead Supply they'll refuse to build more Towers and you'll be quickly overrun, especially since other players will offload their vikings to your lane.

You win the game if you and the other players successfully defend Valhalla for 10 waves.
